Author: tofu_igloo
Text: I feel this. I always end up thinking about the math part of it, like if you weigh 120 then 10 pounds is over 8% of your total weight,  but if you weigh 250 it's more like 21 pounds.  It stresses me out so much that as someone gets smaller, the pounds really do get bigger in that way.    But whatever the logic/reason is, yeah, I didn't even own my own scale 20 pounds ago because nothing felt noticeable enough to check,  and now. ..
